column1: obituary for: rudolph ""chick"" caron | tasker funeral service| home obituaries about us facilities showroom planning a funeral pre-planning immediate arrangements grief support expressions of sympathy links obituaries rudolph ""chick"" caron (june 12
column3: 2015) send sympathy gifts view/ create memorial website send sympathy card dover- rudolph chick caron
column5: of richardson drive died peacefully at his home on saturday june 20
column6: 2015 with his loving wife anita by his side. chick was born in norwich
column9: son of rudolph a. and edna (schaffer) caron. he grew up in norwich and graduated from norwich free academy in 1949. he was a korean war veteran and proudly served from 1950-1954 in the us navy aboard the u. s. s. torsk 423. on october 9
column10: 1954 chick married the love of his life
column11: anita bernier. together they shared a strong and caring marriage of 60 years. during that time he worked for public service of new hampshire
column12: retiring in 1987. chick was an accomplished wood worker who took great pride in his craft. he also enjoyed playing cards
column14: especially the fishing trips over the years with paul. chick was a life member of the dover lodge of elk
column15: attaining the distinguished honor of elk of the year in 1995. he was also a member of the order of the moose lodge 443 and american legion post 8. chick is survived by his wife anita; a grandson
column16: marc j. kirk and his wife mandie; a great granddaughter
column18: who he adored; and a sister rosalie brax of quaker hill
column19: ct. he was predeceased by his infant son richard caron; his daughter diane caron kirk; and a brother
column21: ct. calling hours will be held on wednesday june 24
column22: 2015 from 4-7pm at the tasker funeral home 621 central ave dover
column23: nh. a funeral service will be held on thursday june 25
column24: 2015 at 11am at the tasker funeral home. burial will follow at st. charles cemetery. in lieu of flowers donations can be made to wentworth hospice 121 broadway #115
column26: nh 03820 or to the leukemia & lymphoma society p. o. box 4072 pittsfield
